channel.title: Compiler
channel.description: Can somone hook me up with a link or somting to a good compiler\autorestarter

item.title: Compiler

it does the same fucking thing!

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:3, topic:226604”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=297777.msg2392738#msg2392738 date=1219021998]
I made this compiler in my free time i hope you like it.

[code]@echo off

:def
color 0b

:main
cls
title zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :: type in one of the commands below (dont use caps)
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Main options:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: com = Compile your server.
echo ::: run = Run your server.
echo :::
echo ::: Other Junk:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: set = Change settings.
echo ::: creds = Credits
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::
set /p mains=:: Selection:

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Time to compile…
echo :: Doing stuff…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Checking yo java jdk
echo ::(versions 6u1 to 6u12 only supported and 7u1)
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo :: Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM07
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM06
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_06
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM05
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_05
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_02
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo :: version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo :: go download java…or get up to date lolz
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo :: Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN10
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_10…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN09
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_09…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN08
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_08…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN07
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_07…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN06
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_06…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN05
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_05…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN04
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_04…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN03
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_03…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN02
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_02…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN01
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: enter code for background c0l0r.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo ---------
echo :: Enter code for text c0l0r.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Thanks for useing this compiler =P have fun
echo ::
echo :: Thanks to:
echo :: Zipl0ck for the super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
pause
cls
goto main[/code]
[/quote]

Thats one thing i dont get, why spend time writing that.
when

@echo off
javac *.java
pause

will work just fine.[/quote]
becase that compiler is a pile of crap =) lol will work just fine…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @moparscape_forum_guy moparscape forum guy
item.description:
@moparscape_forum_guy wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:3, topic:226604”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=297777.msg2392738#msg2392738 date=1219021998]
I made this compiler in my free time i hope you like it.

[code]@echo off

:def
color 0b

:main
cls
title zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :: type in one of the commands below (dont use caps)
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Main options:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: com = Compile your server.
echo ::: run = Run your server.
echo :::
echo ::: Other Junk:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: set = Change settings.
echo ::: creds = Credits
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::
set /p mains=:: Selection:

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Time to compile…
echo :: Doing stuff…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Checking yo java jdk
echo ::(versions 6u1 to 6u12 only supported and 7u1)
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo :: Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM07
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM06
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_06
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM05
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_05
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_02
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo :: version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo :: go download java…or get up to date lolz
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo :: Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN10
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_10…

echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: enter code for background c0l0r.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo ---------
echo :: Enter code for text c0l0r.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Thanks for useing this compiler =P have fun
echo ::
echo :: Thanks to:
echo :: Zipl0ck for the super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
pause
cls
goto main[/code]
[/quote]

Thats one thing i dont get, why spend time writing that.
when

@echo off
javac *.java
pause

will work just fine.[/quote]
Lol good point

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:2, topic:226604”]I made this compiler in my free time i hope you like it.

[code]@echo off

:def
color 0b

:main
cls
title zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :: type in one of the commands below (dont use caps)
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Main options:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: com = Compile your server.
echo ::: run = Run your server.
echo :::
echo ::: Other Junk:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: set = Change settings.
echo ::: creds = Credits
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::
set /p mains=:: Selection:

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Time to compile…
echo :: Doing stuff…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Checking yo java jdk
echo ::(versions 6u1 to 6u12 only supported and 7u1)
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo :: Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM10

SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM07
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07

echo :: Results:

pause
goto main

:COM06

echo :: Results:

echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03

goto main

:COM2

SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo :: version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo :: go download java…or get up to date lolz
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo :: Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN10
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_10…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN09
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_09…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN08
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_08…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN07
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_07…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin

echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: enter code for background c0l0r.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo ---------
echo :: Enter code for text c0l0r.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

pause

goto main

:creds
cls
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

echo :: Thanks to:
echo :: Zipl0ck for the super simple compiler

Thats one thing i dont get, why spend time writing that.

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I made this compiler in my free time i hope you like it.

[code]@echo off

:def
color 0b

:main
cls
title zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Zipl0cks super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :: type in one of the commands below (dont use caps)
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::: Main options:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: com = Compile your server.
echo ::: run = Run your server.
echo :::
echo ::: Other Junk:(plese dont use caps or it wont work)
echo ::: set = Change settings.
echo ::: creds = Credits
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::
set /p mains=:: Selection:

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Time to compile…
echo :: Doing stuff…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Checking yo java jdk
echo ::(versions 6u1 to 6u12 only supported and 7u1)
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo :: Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: succsceso!
pause
goto main

:COM08

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo :: Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN12

echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:set
cls
echo :: enter code for background c0l0r.
echo :: B0 = Black
echo :: B1 = Blue
echo :: B2 = Green
echo :: B3 = Cyan
echo :: B4 = Red
echo :: B5 = Purple
echo :: B6 = Yellow
echo :: B7 = White
echo ---------
echo :: Enter code for text c0l0r.
echo :: T0 = Black
echo :: T1 = Blue
echo :: T2 = Green
echo :: T3 = Cyan
echo :: T4 = Red
echo :: T5 = Purple
echo :: T6 = Yellow
echo :: T7 = White

set /p s=:: Choice:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: Thanks for useing this compiler =P have fun
echo ::
echo :: Thanks to:
echo :: Zipl0ck for the super simple compiler
echo ::
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
pause
cls
goto main[/code]
